verses.text: \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w*, however, \w was|strong="H7451"\w* \w greatly|strong="H1419"\w* \w displeased|strong="H7489"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* he \w became|strong="H2734"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w while|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* country? \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* quick \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w flee|strong="H1272"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w compassionate|strong="H7349"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, slow \w to|strong="H5704"\w* anger, \w abounding|strong="H7227"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w*—\w One|strong="H2088"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w relents|strong="H5162"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* sending \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4194"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* replied, “\w Have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3190"\w* any \w right|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w himself|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shelter|strong="H5521"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w its|strong="H6213"\w* \w shade|strong="H6738"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* \w happen|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4487"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vine, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w grew|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* provide \w shade|strong="H6738"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w*’s \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* ease \w his|strong="H3068"\w* discomfort, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w greatly|strong="H1419"\w* \w pleased|strong="H8055"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w plant|strong="H7021"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5927"\w* \w dawn|strong="H7837"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w next|strong="H4283"\w* \w day|strong="H4283"\w*, God \w appointed|strong="H4487"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w worm|strong="H8438"\w* \w that|strong="H5927"\w* \w attacked|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w plant|strong="H7021"\w* \w so|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w* \w withered|strong="H3001"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* rising, God \w appointed|strong="H4487"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w scorching|strong="H2759"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w beat|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w*’s \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* grew \w faint|strong="H5968"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w wished|strong="H7592"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, saying, “\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*.”

Then \w God|strong="H3190"\w* asked \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w*, “\w Have|strong="H4194"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* any right \w to|strong="H5704"\w* be \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w plant|strong="H7021"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w do|strong="H3190"\w*,” \w he|strong="H5704"\w* replied. “\w I|strong="H5704"\w* am \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* enough \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w die|strong="H4194"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w You|strong="H5921"\w* cared \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w plant|strong="H7021"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* tended \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w grow|strong="H1431"\w*. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* sprang \w up|strong="H1431"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* perished \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w should|strong="H3225"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w care|strong="H5921"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*, \w which|strong="H5892"\w* \w has|strong="H3426"\w* \w more|strong="H7235"\w* \w than|strong="H7235"\w* 120,000 \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H7227"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* cattle \w as|strong="H5892"\w* \w well|strong="H3045"\w*?”
